title: Human Resource Development Education Design Utilizing 3D Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and comprehension of mathematics education methodologies
context.additional_context: Conducted in a 3D sandbox game environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can design PBL projects in a 3D gamification environment to operate human resource development training programs
Learners implement math-based educational scenarios using 3D sandbox tools similar to Creativerse
Learners improve educational satisfaction by over 20% through analysis of learning outcome metrics (PE, EE, SI, FC)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
